actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat deductions for research and experimental expenses attributable to activities conducted in the United States as allocable to income from sources within the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat amounts allowed as deductions for research and experimental expenditures attributable to activities conducted in the United States as allocable to income from sources within the United States and deductible from such income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat deductions for research and experimental expenses attributable to activities conducted in the United States as allocable to income from sources within the United States.
